text: RT @NewsHour "Your silence and your amnesia is complicit," Cory Booker (D-NJ) says to DHS chief Kirstjen Nielsen about her inability to confirm or deny Trump's use of vulgar language during last week's immigration reform meeting. As California's former Attorney General, I’ve seen firsthand how illegal price gouging and fraud can target Californians. In the wake of the recent natural disasters, I urge all Californians to report fraud or price gouging to https://oag.ca.gov/report or 800-952-5225.

Following my request, @CMSGov has added special enrollment periods for Medicare Advantage plans for victims of #HurricaneMaria in #PuertoRico. Find more information here: https://www.cms.gov/Newsroom/MediaReleaseDatabase/Press-releases/2018-Press-releases-items/2018-01-17.html

Calling all Californians: January 31st is the last day to enroll in a health care plan. Healthy people can become sick people in the blink of an eye. Don’t delay — go to http://coveredca.com to #GetCovered.
